sentences.en: Clients normally pay fees in advance, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
sentences.cn: 客户通常按月、季度或年度预付费用。
他一年的学费是两千美元.

sentences.en: Novello says college students will spend $4.2 billion yearly on alcoholic beverages.
sentences.cn: 诺韦洛说大学生每年在酒精饮品上会消费掉42亿美元。

sentences.en: Pay is reviewed on a yearly basis.
Salary levels are reviewed on a yearly basis.
sentences.cn: 工资水平每年都要审查。

sentences.en: The advertising agency rang up 1.4 billion dollars in yearly sales.
sentences.cn: 这家广告代理商每年销售额达14亿美元。

sentences.en: The average yearly increment in labour productivity in industry was 4.5 per cent.
sentences.cn: 工业劳动生产率年平均增长4.5%。

sentences.en: The flower show is a yearly event in our town.
sentences.cn: 我们镇上的花展一年举行一次.

sentences.en: The People's Bank compounds interest yearly.
sentences.cn: 人民银行以年为单位计算复利.

sentences.en: The yearly rental of her house is 2400 yuan.
This is the half-yearly meeting of the interim committee.
sentences.cn: 这是临时委员会召开的年中例会。

sentences.en: We paid a subscription of 5 pounds yearly.
sentences.cn: 我们按年度缴纳5英镑的订阅费.

words.tran_cn: 整整一年的；持续一年的

trans.tran_en: happening or appearing every year or once a year
happening or appearing every year or once a year
